resources.string: \nThis help page provides an overview of how to use the HangTight app. The functionality of the app, including creating and saving workouts, is explained in this page. \nHangboards are only recommended for advanced climbers and should never be used without thoroughly warming up first.

The workout is structured using hang, rest, reps, sets and recover values. 

1)A rep consists of a hang followed by a rest. 

2)This is repeated until the chosen number of reps is reached. 

3)The recover timer will start - this is a complete set. 

4)The sets are repeated until the chosen number of sets is reached.

To create a workout click on the \'create new workout\' button on the home page. A page will load where you can input values for hang, rest, reps, sets and recover. Once you have selected the values wanted either press \'start workout\' to begin the workout or \'Save Workout\' to save the workout.

To load a workout click \'Load Saved Workout\' on the home screen. A list of saved workouts will appear. Tap on a saved workout to start it. Press and hold on a saved workout to edit or delete it. \n\nTo save a workout for future use simply create the workout by pressing \'Create New Workout\' on the home screen and then pressing the \'Save Workout\' button. At this point a title and description will need to be entered. A message will appear at the bottom of the screen if the save was successful.

The settings page can be accessed by clicking the settings icon at the top right of the home screen. \nThere are then options to change the default for sound and vibrate to be On/Off, change the default for showing the warning about warming up properly before beginning any workout as well as options to change the background image to male/female. Finally, there is a slider for the \'Pre-Workout Countdown\'. This is set to 5 seconds by default but can be altered to allow more or less time to get ready after starting the workout.
